title: Ticket #3940: Windows File transfer bug
description:
See ticket #3760 for rust details. Basic issue is that folder/ in transfer list on windows which should move contents of the folder to the top of the sandbox on the execute machine does not work on windows.

Ticket #3760 shows how to reproduce and the error I just verified.
remarks: duplicate ticket to #3760 which is still broken. Resolving duplicate ticket
creator: bt
